Headline: East China's Jiangsu reports human case of H10N3 avian influenza - CGTN
Text: Share CopiedA human infection from the H10N3 avian influenza virus was reported in east China's Jiangsu Province, China's National Health Commission said on Tuesday.The patient, a 41-year-old male living in Zhenjiang City, is currently in stable condition and meets discharge standards.Health authorities said the case was a sporadic virus transmission from poultry to human, and the risk of causing a pandemic was extremely low.Copyright Â© 2020 CGTN.
